UPDATE t_product_receive_detail SET product_receive_id = #{productReceiveId}, material_code = #{materialCode}, material_name = #{materialName}, material_model = #{materialModel}, material_spec = #{materialSpec}, unit = #{unit}, amount = #{amount}, receiver_id = #{receiverId}, receiver_name = #{receiverName}, receive_time = #{receiveTime}, qualified_amount = #{qualifiedAmount}, unqualified_amount = #{unqualifiedAmount}, unqualified_introduction = #{unqualifiedIntroduction}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, receive_introduction=#{receiveIntroduction}, bar_code =#{barCode}, material_type_id=#{materialTypeId}, material_type_name=#{materialTypeName}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.bar_code from t_product_receive_detail t where t.del_flag='0' ORDER BY SUBSTRING(bar_code, -10) DESC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT * FROM t_product_receive_detail a where a.del_flag='0' and a.product_receive_id=#{productReceiveId} and a.qualified_amount is NULL
SELECT * FROM t_product_receive_detail a where a.del_flag = '0' AND a.product_receive_id = #{productReceiveId}

select w.`name` as warehouseName, a.arrive_time as arrivalDate, d.id as receiptDetailId, d.material_code as materailCode, d.material_name as materialName, d.bar_code as barCode from t_product_receive a LEFT JOIN t_product_receive_detail d on d.product_receive_id=a.id LEFT JOIN t_warehouse_info w on w.id=a.warehouse_id where d.del_flag ='0' AND a.id=#{receiptBillId}
